WorkItem.Description: Making an issue so I don't forget about this. Does someone have an example of an item that is wrong currently (on dev build)?

Comments.Message:
Flickering Shoulders
uses ids: 233, 234, 235, 236 - We have 191 secondary, Blizz has 192; Primary is correct
378: http://us.battle.net/wow/en/item/71030#tab=randomProperties

no close stats: Agility = 321, Secondary stats 218; best we have is 317 Agility, 216 secondary
391: http://us.battle.net/wow/en/item/71403#tab=randomProperties

Flickering Shoulderpads
uses ids: 227, 228, 229, 230, 231, 232 - We have 191 secondary, Blizz has 192; Primary is correct
378: http://us.battle.net/wow/en/item/71025#tab=randomProperties

Same problem with the mail shoulders, Intellect = 321, Secondary stats 218; best we have is 317 Intellect, 216 secondary
391: http://us.battle.net/wow/en/item/71450#tab=randomProperties

Flickering Cowl
Nothing close:
Blizz - 611 Stamina, 347 Intellect, 242 Secondary
Best we have - 611 Stamina, 359 Intellect, 248 Secondary

Nothing close:
Blizz - 689 Stamina, 400 Intellect, 276 Secondary
Best we have - 689 Stamina, 405 Intellect, 280 Secondary
391: http://us.battle.net/wow/en/item/71421#tab=randomProperties

Everything seems fine
